ygData.subject: Re: Voice Communications: BattleCom vs Roger Wilco
ygData.msgSnippet: No - you can t alt-tab out of EQ and it disables access to secondary monitors in Win98 multiple monitor configurations.  Verant says this is to prevent
ygData.messageBody:
No - you can't alt-tab out of EQ and it disables access to secondary
monitors in Win98 multiple monitor configurations. Verant says this is to
prevent cheating - and it is a MAJOR pain to people who "have lives"
(Nothing worse than getting a phone call from someone needing a contact
phone number and I have to tell them I'll call them back in 5-10 minutes...)

However - any programs that were launched prior to EQ continue running in
the background - so Battle Com and Roger Wilco can function...

Slyde of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: <weya@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 10:56 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Voice Communications: BattleCom vs Roger Wilco


> From: weya@...
>
> Can you guys actually run other programs while running
> EQ??? I can't alt-tab to anything else without totally
> screwing EQ and having to ctl-alt-del it to get it to
